thread.title: BULL TERRIER CLUB OF CTRL AZ
thread.title_full: Hodges Badge Company, Inc reviewed by BULL TERRIER CLUB OF CTRL AZ

author: BULL TERRIER CLUB OF CTRL AZ
title: BULL TERRIER CLUB OF CTRL AZ
text: Nice people and fast work, But the quality of their so called "Silver" metal trophies were thin and cheaply made tin. If they gave better detailed descriptions of them then I certainly wouldn't have bought them. Once engraved then there is no return. Some of our members joked about using them for target practice.
